game.title: The Lost City
game.synopsis: In a world where ancient civilizations once thrived, the legendary city of Zerzura has been hidden for centuries. As an archaeologist, you are tasked with uncovering its secrets and piecing together the mysteries of the past.
game.beginning: Players begin in a dense jungle, exploring the ruins of an ancient temple where they stumble upon an ancient map that hints at the location of Zerzura. They soon find themselves on a quest to decipher cryptic clues and overcome treacherous obstacles as they delve deeper into the heart of the lost city.
game.ending: Upon finally discovering Zerzura, players uncover the secrets of the long-lost civilization, but also awaken an ancient evil that threatens to destroy everything. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, players must use all their skills and knowledge to defeat the evil force and save the city from destruction.
